resources.string: Step 1: Select the \'Enter what you hear here\' box and you\'ll see the keyboard.
Step 2: Play the video for a few seconds (about a sentence) remember it and then pause.
Step 3: Touch the microphone icon on the keyboard and wait for it to initialize.
Step 4: Once the keyboard says \'Speak now\' say-back the sentence you heard and wait for a second or two.
Step 5: Repeat until you finish the specified time.
• Type what you hear from start_time to end_time.
• The first word of your answer should be start_word and last should be end_word.
• Tap on the video to toggle play/pause.
• Use the [img src=ic_replay_10_black_24dp/][img src=ic_replay_5_black_24dp/][img src=ic_forward_5_black_24dp/][img src=ic_forward_10_black_24dp/] buttons to navigate through the video.
